analysis.Summary: Vue component that renders an autoplaying, i18n‚Äêaware carousel of feature slides using Embla Carousel

Components.name: SliderFeatures (default export)

Components.name: emblaCarouselVue

Components.name: Autoplay

analysis.Usage: Imported and registered in a parent Vue view or component (e.g. `<SliderFeatures/>`), typically under modules/auth/views
Notes: Uses `<script setup>` syntax for composition API
Defines hard-coded feature data for English and Russian locales
Applies SCSS scoped styles for carousel container and indicators
Dynamic inline background images based on slide index
Autoplay configured with custom options (no stop on interaction, focus, etc.)
